You can channel a burst of the multiverseâ€™s healing power, though doing so shatters your focus. You can end your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.q5GZ1Oo5U3VODBpf]{Silent State (Ex)} as a standard action to gain the effects of either @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.yd5mQwImyuqd8wUs]{Restoration, Lesser} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.wMBxnYkNbzWJklIB]{Remove Condition}. If the condition you would remove limits the actions you can take per round, you can instead spend all the actions you do receive that turn to activate this ability at the end of your turn. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 13th level and 17th level. At 15th level, you can spend 1 Resolve Point when activating this ability to instead gain the effects of restoration and can spend additional RP as necessary to remove a negative level.
